item.title: CVE-2023-20807|2024-08-02T09:14:41.008Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt2713%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8188%2C%20mt8195%2C%20mt8395%2C%20mt8673
item.description: In dpe, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07608433; Issue ID: ALPS07608433.
